text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump's not realizing the seriousness of COVID19 it's going to take at least July if we are lucky for some workers to go back to work. I want to go back to work and get parts delivered to FCA in Michigan, I have to wait. I'm a high risk if getting  C19....
